page.title: 10ADULT LIFE STYLES
page.content: 4.26s TO 35s. The majority are married,with 5 or more 'O'-levels and 2 or 3 'A'-levels. They live in 4-bedroom detached houses ,owning a TV, hi-fi,dishwasher,washing machine, fridge and 2 telephones. Most have a car and spend <5 hours a week driving. Their favourite sports are skiing, sailing and ball games. They read the 'Daily Telegraph' and local papers and visit the cinema and library regularly,spending 2 weeks abroad on holiday. The men spend their weekends on DIY and the women cooking and sewing. They often visit pubs.and restaurants and shop once a week. 5.OVER 65s. All are retired and live in small houses with washing machines, fridges and telephones. They own a car, do not participate in sport, but visit restaurants, cinemas, theatres and art galleries & holiday in the UK.
